A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a fabulous middle movie. Ties up some stuff from XII and lay some ground for IX. Too many people try to project what their ideal movie would be instead of enjoying the movie that was made. maybe you would have done something different\, but you didn't make the movie. I want to dock it a little for all the last minute saves\, but that is how all TV and movies are these days.
